name: Pearl Solidification
description: When the Fontemer Pearl attached to Millennial Pearl Seahorse negates DMG from Summons, change to Usage(s) not being consumed twice per Round.
descriptionraw: When the <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124032]</color> attached to $[A2403] negates DMG from Summons, change to $[K3] not being consumed twice per Round.
descriptionreplaced: When the <color=#FFFFFFFF>Fontemer Pearl</color> attached to Millennial Pearl Seahorse negates DMG from Summons, change to <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color> not being consumed twice per Round.
